subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built during the era of the Rajputs?
question_hi: राजस्थान में राजपूतों के तथापि बनाए गए एक ग्रीष्मकारी क्या है?
explanation_en:
Mehrangarh Fort is a famous fort in Rajasthan built by Rao Jodhaji in the 16th century.
Mehrangarh Fort (मेरनगर ग्रीष्मकारी) is known for its beautiful architecture and strategic location.

question_en: Which famous Rajasthan monument is known as the 'Palace of Winds'?
question_hi: रामन में सं गीर में सं गीर में

option_hi.A_hi: जां सं गीर में गीर में संगीर में
